name: Cold Talks
description:
This game was made in 3 days for Cozy Winter Jam 2022 and the theme was... Connections!

Controls:

Arrows or WASD to walk.

X to interact.

ESC to quit to menu.

Story:

You're Jake. An old man that has been unfortunate enough to be living a very cold winter without a place to stay. 

There are some people on the street but Jake doesn't seem to know how to communicate with them. By reading some books, that are spread across the map, jake's vocabulary expands deeply. With all this knowledge he can finally talk to people and figure out a way to get a home!

Credits:

Programmer & Audio Engenieer: Ricardo Palma

Composer & Sound Designer: SundroMusic

Artist: madhominem

Happy Winter!
